title: Up First briefing: Trump wins Iowa GOP caucuses; stay prepared during winter outages
description: Former President Donald Trump had a big victory at last night's Iowa GOP caucuses. Much of the U.S. is experiencing dangerously cold weather. Here's how to stay prepared in case of a power outage.

title: Trump adviser compares Trump's charges to those of civil rights activists
description: A senior adviser compared the former president's 91 criminal charges to those faced by civil rights activists in the 1960s.
